languages.text: "На меня не гляди, эттфатер. Хоть эта машина и благословлена гордым именем Лемана Расса, для Ангела Императора она слишком тесна".
"Do not look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit one of the Emperor's Angels."
languages.original_text: "На меня не гляди, эттфатер. Хоть эта машина и благословлена гордым именем Лемана Расса, для Ангела Императора она слишком тесна".

traits.locale_text: "Don't look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit an Emperor's Angel."
"Don't look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit an Emperor's Angel."
"Don't look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit an Emperor's Angel."

"Do not look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit one of the Emperor's Angels."

languages.text: «No me mire a mí, Aett-Vater. Puede que esta máquina esté bendita con el orgulloso nombre de Leman Russ, pero es demasiado pequeña para un ángel del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Do not look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit one of the Emperor's Angels."

traits.locale_text: «No me mire a mí, Aett-Vater. Puede que esta máquina esté bendita con el orgulloso nombre de Leman Russ, pero es demasiado pequeña para un ángel del Emperador».

languages.text: “别看我，狼领。尽管这台机器被赐予了黎曼·鲁斯这个充满荣耀的名字，但它实在是太窄了，根本装不下帝皇的天使。”
languages.original_text: "Do not look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit one of the Emperor's Angels."

traits.locale_text: “别看我，狼领。尽管这台机器被赐予了黎曼·鲁斯这个充满荣耀的名字，但它实在是太窄了，根本装不下帝皇的天使。”

languages.text: 「俺を見るな、アエット＝ヴァテル。この機械は誇り高きレマン・ラスの名の恩恵を受けているかもしれないが、皇帝の天使のひとりが収まるには小さすぎる」
languages.original_text: "Do not look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit one of the Emperor's Angels."

traits.locale_text: 「俺を見るな、アエット＝ヴァテル。この機械は誇り高きレマン・ラスの名の恩恵を受けているかもしれないが、皇帝の天使のひとりが収まるには小さすぎる」

languages.text: « Ne me regardez pas comme ça, aett-vater. Cette machine a beau avoir le privilège de porter l'auguste nom de Leman Russ, son habitacle est trop exigu pour accueillir l'un des Anges de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Do not look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit one of the Emperor's Angels."

traits.locale_text: « Ne me regardez pas comme ça, aett-vater. Cette machine a beau avoir le privilège de porter l'auguste nom de Leman Russ, son habitacle est trop exigu pour accueillir l'un des Anges de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "Bana bakma Aett-Vater. Bu makine, Leman Russ'ın gururlu adıyla kutsanmış olsa da İmparator'un Melekleri'nden birinin sığamayacağı kadar küçük."
languages.original_text: "Do not look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit one of the Emperor's Angels."

traits.locale_text: "Bana bakma Aett-Vater. Bu makine, Leman Russ'ın gururlu adıyla kutsanmış olsa da İmparator'un Melekleri'nden birinin sığamayacağı kadar küçük."

languages.text: "Seht nicht mich an, Aett-Vater. Diese Maschine mag mit dem stolzen Namen von Leman Russ gesegnet sein, aber sie ist zu klein für einen der Engel des Imperators."
languages.original_text: "Do not look at me, Aett-Vater. This machine may have been blessed with the proud name of Leman Russ, but it is too small to fit one of the Emperor's Angels."

traits.locale_text: "Seht nicht mich an, Aett-Vater. Diese Maschine mag mit dem stolzen Namen von Leman Russ gesegnet sein, aber sie ist zu klein für einen der Engel des Imperators."
